entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Deux-Montagnes
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:46 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.3°C

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 8.
